name: markdownjs-rails
description: **markdownjs-rails** wraps the [markdown-js](https://github.com/evilstreak/markdown-js) library for silky smooth use with the asset pipeline provided by Rails 3.1. The gem includes the development (non-minified) source for ease of exploration. The asset pipeline will handle minification in your production environment or if you set `config.assets.debug = false` in other environments.
